title: e-District Application Development / Maintenance
description: e-District is a State Mission Mode Project under the National e-Governance Plan. The project aims to target high volume services and undertake backend computerization to electronically enable the delivery of these services through Common Service Centres (CSC). e-District offers G2C(Government to Citizens), G2E (Government to Employees) and G2B (Government to Business) services of the Government

title: Provide IT Solutions for Government Departments
description: Revamping of various Government Websites, Fixing VAPT for Government Websites, API Integration of SMS Gateway, Email and other State & Central Government API Integration. Making the Government websites in compliance with GIGW (Guidelines for Indian Government Websites) and NeSDA (National e-Governance Service Delivery Assessment).

title: SDG (Sustainable Development Goals) Monitoring Portal
description: A Dynamic Web Portal for SDG monitoring that will act as a single point of access to stakeholders for analyzing the performance of each indicator.

title: Web based Monitoring / Reporting Application
description: Computerization of MR-IV data of the Land Reforms Department helps to improve the Monitoring system and provides transparency in land records management of all districts.

title: Online Registration System
description: A Dynamic Web-Portal for registration of the participants of Tamil Nadu Hackathon Event for CM awards. Evaluate, design, implement and maintain internal and external portal applications.

title: Employee Information System
description: A Dynamic Web-Portal for employers to view their employees profile like Personal details, Education, Experience and Skillset.
